name: Ext_R5_ServiceRequest_patientInstruction
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.ServiceRequest.patientInstruction for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents ServiceRequest.patientInstruction from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ServiceRequest|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4.

element.definition: Instructions in terms that are understood by the patient or consumer.
element.comment: `ServiceRequest.patientInstruction` maps to R4 `ServiceRequest.patientInstruction`.
